cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Enjoy all the comforts of being at home in this inviting double room in the villa which boasts access to a shared bathroom, a fully-furnished kitchen and a comfy lounge area where you can happily while away your stay.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A serene escape awaits in Lolly, our refurbished caravan tucked away amidst the lush gardens. Blending comfort and tranquility with a double bed, basic cooking facilities, tea & coffee, plus heater for cooler nights. Shared facilities just 30m away.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A warm spacious room in our lovingly restored villa from the 1880s, with a double bed and single bed. Linen and towels included, a shared bathroom, inviting dining and relaxing and fully equipped kitchen are in the house. A haven for tired travellers.

privates.name: Standard 4 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Embrace the laid-back vibe of The Nest, where comfort meets convenience in a serene garden setting. Sleep well on comfortable beds, relax on bean bags and connect via free wifi.
All bedding, towels and hot water bottles supplied. Close to facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Standard 5 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Our spacious family room, nestled in native gardens, brings the group together for quality time and a restful stay. 
Everything supplied for comfort, and the shared facilities are nearby.The perfect home for a few nights of adventure and connection.
